list.sql: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS user_id,user_disabled,user_name,user_email,user_mobile,user_account,dept_name FROM FW_USERS LEFT JOIN FW_DEPARTMENT ON FW_USERS.DEPT_ID=FW_DEPARTMENT.DEPT_ID WHERE FW_USERS.REC_ISDELETED=0
select * from fw_department
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS dict_id,dict_name,dict_code,dict_index from fw_dict where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS rec_id,fw_dict.dict_name, item_name,item_value from fw_dict_item inner join fw_dict on fw_dict_item.dict_id=fw_dict.dict_id where fw_dict_item.dict_id='@query.dict_id@' and fw_dict.rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS bas_label.label_id,plabel.label_name as parent_name, bas_label.label_name ,ifnull(ul.label_count,0) as label_count from bas_label inner join bas_label plabel on bas_label.parent_id=plabel.label_id left join (select label_id,sum(label_count) as label_count  from crm_user_label group by label_id) ul on ul.label_id=bas_label.label_id where bas_label.label_disabled=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS role_id,role_name,role_admin from fw_roles where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS s.store_id,DATE_FORMAT(store_create,'%Y-%m-%d') as store_create,store_name,store_grade,store_city_name,store_url,store_type,store_level,store_ho,store_logistics,store_delivery_days,store_logistics_days,store_price_level,store_quality_level,store_design_level,store_package_level,store_service_level,p.discountRate,p.success,p.sales,p.total from bus_store s left join (select store_id, sum(product_discount_price)/sum(product_origin_price) as discountRate,sum(product_sales)/count(store_id) as sales,sum(product_success)/count(store_id) as success,sum(product_total)/count(store_id) as total from bus_product group by store_id) p on s.store_id = p.store_id where s.rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS crm_user.user_id,user_city,(case user_sex when 0 then '女' else '男' end) as sexname,gpnames,platform.ptname,user_name,membertypeids,umlist.membertypenames, user_image,user_mobile,user_real_name,user_corp_name,user_corp_department,user_corp_position,user_create_date,user_serial from crm_user left join (select user_id,group_concat(platform_type) as ptname from crm_platform group by user_id) platform on crm_user.user_id=platform.user_id left join (select user_id,group_concat(mt.member_id) as membertypeids,group_concat(mt.member_name) as membertypenames from crm_user_member um inner join crm_membership_type mt on um.member_id = mt.member_id where mt.rec_isdeleted=0 and valid_forever=1 or (valid_forever=0 and valid_start<now() and valid_end>now()) group by user_id) umlist on crm_user.user_id=umlist.user_id left join (select user_id,group_concat(gu.group_id) as gpids,group_concat(gp.group_name) as gpnames from crm_group_user gu inner join (select group_id,group_name from crm_group order by group_index) gp on gu.group_id=gp.group_id  group by gu.user_id) usergroup on crm_user.user_id=usergroup.user_id where 1=1

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS order_id,u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_mobile,u.user_image, order_no,app_date,member_type_name,user_guide_name,order_total from crm_join_order mo inner join crm_user u on mo.user_id=u.user_id where pay_status=1
list.countsql: select ifnull(sum(order_total),0) as total from crm_join_order mo inner join crm_user u on mo.user_id=u.user_id where pay_status=1

list.sql: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS rec_id,lb.label_name,label_count from crm_user_label ul inner join bas_label lb on ul.label_id=lb.label_id where lb.label_disabled=0 and user_id='@query.userid@'

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS crm_group.group_id,group_name,group_type,group_image,ifnull(groupusers.usertotal,0) as usertotal from crm_group left join (select group_id,count(1) as usertotal from crm_group_user where user_exit_status=0 group by  group_id) groupusers on crm_group.group_id=groupusers.group_id where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS member_id,member_name,member_price,member_level,(select count(1) from crm_user_member where member_id=t.member_id and (valid_forever=1 or (valid_forever=0 and DATE_FORMAT(valid_start,'%Y-%m-%d')<=curdate() and  DATE_FORMAT(valid_end,'%Y-%m-%d')>=curdate()))) as membercount from crm_membership_type t where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS rec_id,company,department,position,status,fulltime,DATE_FORMAT(startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as startdate,DATE_FORMAT(leavedate,'%Y-%m-%d') as leavedate from crm_user_we where user_id='@query.userid@'

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS article_id,catelog.catelog_id,catelog.catelog_name,article_source,article_source_url,article_publish_status,article_author,article_title,article_cover,article_type,article_brief,article_label,article_original,DATE_FORMAT(article_publish_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as article_publish_date,article_audit_opinion from cnt_article inner join cnt_catelog catelog on cnt_article.catelog_id=catelog.catelog_id where cnt_article.rec_isdeleted=0 and catelog.rec_isdeleted=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS catalog_id,catalog_name,catalog_image,catalog_disabled from act_catalog where rec_isdeleted=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS slider_id,slider_position,slider_key from portal_slider  where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS activity_id,activity_is_free, catalog.catalog_id,catalog.catalog_name,activity_topic,DATE_FORMAT(activity_date_start,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_date_start,DATE_FORMAT(activity_date_end,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_date_end,DATE_FORMAT(activity_ticket_end,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_ticket_end,activity_status,activity_cover,activity_city_name,activity_desc,activity_label from act_activity activity inner join act_catalog catalog on activity.catalog_id=catalog.catalog_id where activity.rec_isdeleted=0 and catalog.rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS o.yhq,r.user_name,r.user_mobile,r.user_company,r.user_position,r.user_mail,r.enroll_json, c.channel_name,DATE_FORMAT(payment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as order_date,t.ticket_title,o.order_is_gift, ticket_count,o.ticket_price,order_discount,order_total,checkin.checkcount from act_orders o inner join act_ticket t on o.ticket_id=t.ticket_id left join act_enroll r on o.enroll_id=r.enroll_id left join act_channel c on o.order_channel = c.channel_id left join (select order_id,count(1) as checkcount from act_order_checkin  group by order_id,checkin_type) checkin on o.order_id=checkin.order_id where o.payment_status=1 and o.activity_id = '@params.id@'
list.countsql: select ifnull(sum(ticket_count),0) as count,ifnull(sum(order_total),0) as total from act_orders o left join act_enroll r on o.enroll_id=r.enroll_id where o.payment_status=1 and o.activity_id = '@params.id@'

list.sql: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS  channel.channel_id,channel.channel_name,t.ticket_title,ifnull(cg.ticketcount,0) as ticketcount,ifnull(cg.tickettotal,0) as tickettotal from act_channel channel join act_ticket t left join(select order_channel,ticket_id,sum(ticket_count) as ticketcount,sum(order_total) as tickettotal from act_orders where ifnull(order_channel,'')<>'' and activity_id='@params.id@' and payment_status=1 group by order_channel,ticket_id) cg on channel.channel_id=cg.order_channel and t.ticket_id=cg.ticket_id where channel.rec_isdeleted=0 and channel.activity_id='@params.id@' and t.activity_id='@params.id@' and cg.ticketcount >0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS ticket_id,ticket_is_gift,ticket_bgcolor,ticket_title,ticket_price,ticket_discount_price,ticket_member_price,ticket_max,ticket_disabled from act_ticket where 1=1

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS pay_id,order_no,order_type, order_desc, data_id,pay.user_id,user.user_name,user.user_mobile,user.user_image,pay_total,pay.pay_date from fw_payment pay inner join crm_user user on pay.user_id=user.user_id where pay.pay_total>0 and pay.pay_status=1
list.countsql: select sum(pay_total) as total from fw_payment pay inner join crm_user user on pay.user_id=user.user_id where  pay.pay_total>0 and pay.pay_status=1

list.sql: select * from vw_income_count where income>0
list.countsql: select ifnull(sum(income),0) as income from vw_income_count where income>0

list.sql: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS product_id,catalog_name,product_type,product_name,product_image,product_price,product_discount_price,product_member_price,product_sale_status,product_stock_limit,product_stock_qty from ec_product where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS order_id,order_no,DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as order_date,member_level,receive_info,order_total,pay_status,pay_type,pay_date,process_status,DATE_FORMAT(process_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as process_date,process_result,order_is_refund,refund_reason,DATE_FORMAT(refund_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as refund_date,u.user_name as processuser,cu.user_mobile,cu.user_name,cu.user_image from ec_product_order po inner join crm_user cu on po.user_id=cu.user_id left join fw_users u on  po.process_user = u.user_id where 1=1
list.countsql: select ifnull(sum(order_total),0) as total from ec_product_order po inner join crm_user cu on po.user_id=cu.user_id left join fw_users u on  po.process_user = u.user_id where 1=1

list.sql: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS activity_id,activity.catalog_id,activity.catalog_name,activity_topic,DATE_FORMAT(activity_date_start,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_date_start,DATE_FORMAT(activity_date_end,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_date_end,DATE_FORMAT(activity_ticket_end,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as activity_ticket_end,activity_price,activity_member_price,activity_status,activity_cover,activity_city_name,activity_desc,activity_label from crm_activity activity inner join act_catalog catalog on activity.catalog_id=catalog.catalog_id where activity.rec_isdeleted=0 and catalog.rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as order_date,ticket_count,ticket_price,order_total,user_name,user_real_name,user_mobile,user_corp_name,user_image from crm_activity_orders o inner join crm_user on o.user_id=crm_user.user_id where o.payment_status=1 and o.activity_id = '@params.id@'
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS *,DATE(media_quotation_valid) as vdate from bas_media where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS enterprise_id,enterprise_name,enterprise_account,item.item_name,enterprise_eng_name,enterprise_logo,enterprise_level,enterprise_type,enterprise_contact,enterprise_contact_mobile,DATE_FORMAT(enterprise_join_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as enterprise_join_date,DATE_FORMAT(enterprise_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as enterprise_end_date,(case when enterprise_end_date<now() then 1 else 0 end) as expired,(select count(1) from  brh_service_application where enterprise_id=brh_enterprise.enterprise_id and app_status=0) as appservice from brh_enterprise left join fw_dict_item item on brh_enterprise.enterprise_business=item.rec_id where rec_isdeleted=0

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS  app_id,DATE_FORMAT(app_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as app_date,app.enterprise_id,enterprise_name,bas.service_name,app_type,app_data_id,app_status,target.name as targetname from brh_service_application app inner join brh_enterprise ent on app.enterprise_id=ent.enterprise_id inner join brh_bas_service bas on app.service_id=bas.service_id inner join vw_brh_servicetarget target on app.app_type=target.type and app.app_data_id=target.dataid where 1=1
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS kol_id,kol_name,kol_cover,kol_company,kol_title,kol_value,kol_contact,kol_disabled from brh_kol where rec_isdeleted=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS *,(case user_sex when 0 then '女' else '男' end) as sexname from crm_user
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS *,(case user_sex when 0 then '女' else '男' end) as sexname from crm_user
select * from  crm_user left join crm_user_yhq on crm_user.user_id=crm_user_yhq.uid
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * from  crm_user_yhq_qa

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS *  from (SELECT tem.id,tem.user_name,tem.createTime,tem.endTime,tem.hard,tem.rightlist,tem.wronglist,tem.score,tem.activity_id from (select crm_user.user_id,crm_user_yhq_result.id,crm_user.user_name,crm_user_yhq_result.createTime,crm_user_yhq_result.endTime,hard,rightlist,wronglist, score, activity_id from crm_user_yhq_result LEFT JOIN crm_user on crm_user_yhq_result.uid=crm_user.user_id where crm_user_yhq_result.endTime !=' ' ORDER BY score DESC,hard ) as tem group by tem.user_id) as temp where  temp.score

detail.sql: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS crm_user.user_name,result.id,result.hard,result.score,result.rightlist,result.wronglist,result.createTime,result.endTime,result.activity_id from crm_user_yhq_result as result LEFT JOIN crm_user  on crm_user.user_id=result.uid
